publications.title: Integrating Social Responsibility into Core CS
publications.alt: Thumbnail image: illustration of a computer withe a heart on the screen
publications.description: I believe that Computer Science departments must interrogate their core curricular structures to develop more socially responsible students in tech. I have worked to tightly couple responsibility with technical programming assignments in CS 1.

publications.title: Empowering People through Data
publications.alt: Thumbnail image: a simple bar graph with a flower growing out of the top bar
publications.description: I believe that improving the public's engagement, trust, and understanding of data is a critical societal challenge. My research focuses on the opportunities and barriers of both data representations and data tools when they are embedded within our public sphere.

publications.title: Advocating for Undergraduate Research & Institutions
publications.alt: Thumbnail image: illustration of a computer with a pie chart, plant, and arrow on the screen
publications.description: I am an advocate for primarily-undergraduate institutions (PUI) - both as environments that are positioned to confront society's most pressing sociotechnical problems, and also as institutions that offer a compelling balance of teaching and research for new faculty. I work to promote undergraduate research processes and products within my scholarly community, and see undergrad researchers as a critical (but often overlooked) group within academia.
